entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 8:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
